item.description:
Join fellow Members of the South Shore Dining Out Meetup Group and The South Shore 30+ Singles Group for a fun Sunday gathering for some DIM SUM at China Pearl in Quincy. DIM SUM consists of a variety of dumplings, steamed dishes and other goodies. The China Pearl is located in the Kam Man Mall.

See reviews on yelp by clicking on the following link. Yelp Reviews for China Pearl

The price range is $$ Moderate $11.00 -$20.00 per person, including tax and tip, depending how much we all order to share.

This will be a great opportunity to meet and get to know each other, as well as talk about different foods, restaurants, and meals we enjoy. This will also be a great time to plan our next Dining Out event.

This restaurant does not take reservations - So all that are attending must be prompt for us to be seated.

~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~

Brunch @ China Pearl
Sunday, December 5th, 2010 @ 11:30am
237 Quincy Ave
Quincy, MA 02169
617-773-9838
http://www.chinapearl...

Meeting Location: Inside the lobby. We will then wait to be seated together as a Group. If you arrive after we are seated the reservation is under "Alison."

Event Organizer(s): Alison

Min/Max: Min of 4 people 48 hours in advance. Max of 12 people from both groups or may need to add another table.

Guests: None. This event is for Members Only.

Fees: Annual Members - FREE, Group Members - $2; $12 to become a 2011 Annual Member ($10 if you are a 2010 Annual Member, a past 2-year Annual Member or Former AO)

RSVP Deadline: 10PM on Saturday, December 4th. Any changes made after this time may not be seen by an Event Organizer. Changes to No after this time will be considered No-Shows per our guidelines on the About Us page.

Cash Only Policy: Please bring cash! Paying for all of our meals in cash has been SSDOMG'S policy for over three years. It allows us to avoid the confusion of having the waitstaff run multiple credit card slips and generally helps to keep things simpler for everyone.

Inclement Weather: TBD - Please see our Weather policy on the About page (scroll to the bottom and click on "Weather").

~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~

Directions:

Will be posted the week before the event.
item.how_to_find_us: Meet outside the Front Door or just inside the Front Door near the Host Station.

group.name: The South Shore Dining Out Meetup Group

item.name: Join us for DIM SUM at the China Pearl!
